word_mean_info__list.difference: 指举止像朋友一样，往往怀着满腔热情，乐意助人。

指考虑周到，体谅他人，乐于助人。

bilingual.target: 苏茜是一个友好的名字。
接电话的是一个友好的声音。

bilingual.source: But that doesn't stop them having a friendly argument.
bilingual.target: 但这并不妨碍他们进行友好的争论。

bilingual.source: Suddenly, I felt the touch of something bright and friendly.
bilingual.target: 突然，我感受到了一种明亮而友好的触感。

bilingual.source: On social media sites, people tend to post only positive updates that make them appear happy and friendly.
bilingual.target: 在社交媒体网站上，人们往往只发布让他们看起来快乐和友好的积极更新。
他是一个友好的大陆人。
她是一个友好的外国人。
哈尼是一个非常友好的女孩。

list.abstract: friendly（英 [ˈfrendli]，美 [ˈfrendli]），英语单词，作形容词为友好的；亲切的；有利的。作名词为友谊赛。短语搭配有be friendly to，environmentally friendly，friendly fire。例句：Pricing is vital to environment-friendly purchasing（定价对于环保采购至关重要）. 近义词有united，sweet，benign。反义词有hostile，unfriendly。

yingyinNormal.en: You were asleep. Yes, sorry. You are lucky we are friendly pirates. We've got treasure. That's nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你睡着了。是的，对不起。你很幸运，我们都是友好的海盗。我们找到了宝藏。好棒。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. A big green dragon, with little wings, and breezing fire. Roar. Luckily it was a very friendly dragon. And he said, "you can have the treasure." But then, George Pig began to shrink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的！那是一条绿色的巨龙，长着小小的翅膀，还会喷火呢，吼！但是幸运的是他是一条非常友好的巨龙。“我可以把宝箱给你。”但是之后，小猪乔奇的身体开始缩小了。

yingyinNormal.en: But now young men like us, aspiring and friendly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而现在，像我们一样的年轻人，及有上进心，也很友好。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not very friendly to squash her into submission either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 逼她就范也不算友好。

yingyinNormal.en: There's the friendly chuckle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 低声轻笑。

yingyinNormal.en: It is no accident that they are known as the Friendly-Games.
yingyinNormal.zh: 友谊大赛的称号绝不是徒有虚名。

yingyinNormal.en: It isn't friendly, you know, to stir her up into opposition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 扇动她站到反对派可不友好。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard, if I may interject here with a piece of friendly advice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，容我插句嘴，给你一条友情建议。

yingyinNormal.en: You spoke to him. As Solicitor General, I'm friendly with all the justices.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你跟他谈过。作为副检察长，我跟每个法官关系都很好。

yingyinNormal.en: As a student, I created these games as a friendly competition, but be prepared.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在学生时代创立这些比赛作为友谊竞赛。

yingyinNormal.en: The only problem might be getting a little too friendly, if you know what I mean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只怕她打得太火热，你懂的。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if you wanna work with us on this bill, I can stomach a gun friendly candidate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你愿意在法案上与我们合作，我就能容忍一个爱枪的候选人。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, when I've been drinking, sometimes I tend to get overly friendly, and I'm sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喝了酒以后，有时候会变得太热情，对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: Friendship Island has expanded. Glad they finally opened that friendly argument section.
yingyinNormal.zh: 友谊岛扩建了，真开心他们开放了和平争论区。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. Hello. All right, let's dispense with the friendly banter. I believe you know why I'm here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好。好啊。得，我们就省掉假惺惺的友好吧，你应该知道我为何来此。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. How am I going to play this? Sophisticated and relaxed? Friendly, noncommittal? Cold and distant?
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，我该怎么表现呢？优雅而自然的？还是友好而含糊的？或者冷淡且陌生的？

yingyinNormal.en: They stayed in their fortress and gave everybody a friendly smile, and eventually, they walked upstairs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们待在城堡里跟所有人友善地微笑，最终，他们去了楼上。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to remind you that my kids do not know that we are friendly, and I would like to keep it that way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想提醒你，我的孩子不知道我们认识，而且我也不想让他们知道。

yingyinNormal.en: What about the environment, you ask? Without a doubt, new dryers are the environmentally friendly option.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你或许会问，那环境问题呢？没错，在环境保护方面，烘手机是比较好的选择。

yingyinNormal.en: First question: Describe your neighborhood. Run-down with a bunch of rats. Old-world charm. Pet-friendly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一个问题"描述一下周围环境"。房子破烂，鼠辈横行。古色古香，欢迎宠物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The climate-<highlight>friendly</highlight> eggs are produced on specially designed farms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种对气候友好的鸡蛋是在专门设计的农场生产的。

examination_example.sentence: In a social situation, eye contact with another person can show that you are paying attention in a <highlight>friendly</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社交场合，和别人的眼神交流可以表明你在友好地关注对方。

examination_example.sentence: Shop at butchers, delis and fish-sellers regularly, even for small things, and be super <highlight>friendly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 定期在肉店、熟食店和鱼店买东西，哪怕是买一些小东西，也要超级友好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: That would appear to be intuitive and uncomplicated to the user—user­-<highlight>friendly</highlight>, if you will.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于用户来说，这看起来很直观，也不复杂——如果你愿意，也可以说是友好的。

examination_example.sentence: They're promising quality and durability to consumers, and receiving the reputational gains for being environmentally <highlight>friendly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们为消费者保证产品质量，经久耐用，注重环保的同时也赢得了声誉。

examination_example.sentence: The staff is <highlight>friendly</highlight> and helpful, providing you with a map of the city when you arrive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作人员友好且乐于助人，当你到达时，他们会为你提供城市地图。

examination_example.sentence: They rose in the ranks not by being <highlight>friendly</highlight> but by smoking cigarettes, breaking rules and playing jokes on others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在（学生）地位中上升，方式不是通过待人友善而是通过吸烟、违反规则和嘲弄别人。

examination_example.sentence: Only after a year of <highlight>friendly</highlight> discussion did Ms Gaf finally say yes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过一年的友好讨论，Gaf女士终于同意了。

examination_example.sentence: Actually, a true eco-<highlight>friendly</highlight> trip must meet the following principles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，一次真正的环保之旅必须符合以下原则。

examination_example.sentence: He likes to think of sending postcards as a family-<highlight>friendly</highlight> hobby.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他把寄明信片看作是一种家庭间保持友好的爱好。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 较正式用词，指亲切热诚，情意真挚。
指举止像朋友一样，往往怀着满腔热情，乐意助人。
指考虑周到，体谅他人，乐于助人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Because they are lasting and student-<highlight>friendly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它们持久且对学生友好。

examination_example.sentence: As Xi Jinping said,humans should be <highlight>friendly</highlight> to different cultures of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如习近平所说，人类应该对世界上不同的文化友好相处。

examination_example.sentence: "Dog people" and "cat people" often have <highlight>friendly</highlight> arguments about that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “爱狗的人”和“爱猫的人”经常友好地争论。
